text: O humankind! Surely We have created you from a single (pair of) male and female, and made you into tribes and families so that you may know one another (and so build mutuality and co-operative relationships, not so that you may take pride in your differences of race or social rank, and breed enmities). Surely the noblest, most honorable of you in Godâ€™s sight is the one best in piety, righteousness, and reverence for God. Surely God is All-Knowing, All-Aware
